00028 // parse and load a string representation
00029 void Sieve::parse(std::string s)
00030 {
00031     inputString = s; // cannot get this to work as a constructor
00032     // print out input string
00033     // std::cout << inputString << std::endl;
00034 
00035     // a vector of strings
00036     std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00037     // the boost split, assigns values to tokens
00038     boost::split(tokens, inputString, boost::is_any_of("|"));
00039 
00040     for (int i=0; i<tokens.size(); i++) {
00041         // std::cout << tokens[i] << std::endl;
00042         // create a Residual class
00043         ResidualClass rc;
00044         rc.setModulusAndShift(tokens[i]);
00045         // print  modulus and shifts
00046         // std::cout << a.represent() << std::endl;
00047         rcStorage.push_back(rc);
00048     };
00049

00070 // =============================================================================
00071 // get a string representation
00072 const std::string Sieve::represent()
00073 {
00074 //     std::stringstream out;
00075 // 
00076 //     for (int i=0; i<rcStorage.size(); i++) {
00077 //         // call represent on residual class
00078 //         out << rcStorage[i].represent() << "|" ; 
00079 //     };
00080 //     return out.str(); // returns as a string
00081 
00082 
00083     std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00084 
00085     for (int i=0; i<rcStorage.size(); i++) {
00086         // call represent on residual class
00087         tokens.push_back(rcStorage[i].represent()); 
00088     };
00089 
00090     // using boost::join, returns a string
00091     return boost::join(tokens, "|");
00092 }

00097 // =============================================================================
00098 // second arg is passing an integer vector z by reference
00099 // return a vector
00100 std::vector<int> Sieve::segment(int n, std::vector<int> &z)
00101 {
00102     // create a variable named post that is a vector; init w/ array
00103     // initialize with zeros
00104     std::vector<int> post;
00105     post.reserve(z.size());
00106 
00107     return post;
00108 }
